author: nflaig
content: How do other teams feel about including https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/pull/3787 and https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/pull/4005 in Electra? author: 0xunclebill
content: The SingleAttestation change was nice because it closed a potential DOS vector. It seems that 4005 just improves readability? Is 3787 also just for readability sake or are there some deeper benefits? If it’s just for readability sake, I don’t think it’s worth introducing these changes in Electra (or ever)
